name: JAM ALLERGY vs The Ninja Microbe
name_original: JAM ALLERGY vs The Ninja Microbe
description:
You're ALLERGIC TO JAM!! Dodge it to win!!

Dodge one hundred evil jams to win the game!

Works on a real  hardware! (hopefully) LOL

Try it yourself on an emulator OR uploading it to this online emulator:

https://www.emulatrix.com/

NOTE: the music is a bit loud, be prepared for some blast processing!

This was coded entirely in Second Basic Studio for the Rutgers COGS Scarlet game jam!
